biotools.summary:
A novel shiny app to produce comprehensive, detailed and interactive plots for population genetic analysis.

StructuRly is an R package containing a shiny application to produce detailed and interactive graphs of the results of a Bayesian cluster analysis obtained with the most common population genetic software used to investigate population structure, such as STRUCTURE or ADMIXTURE.

bioschemas.name: StructuRly
